item.title: Call For Paper
item.description: DevFest Toulouse will take place on October 3rd, 2019 at Pierre Baudis congress center. Our fourth edition will gather 1000 attendees! While waiting for the D-day do not hesitate to propose a talk at DevFest Toulouse CFP. It is now open and this year it will be for 2 months only (from March the 25th to Mai the 25th.) Be aware that at mid terms, we will select our ‚Äúearly speakers‚Äù, so do not wait till the end!

item.title: Get ready for DevFest Toulouse 2019!
item.description: Today it is with great pleasure that we announce you that the 4th edition of DevFest Toulouse will take place October 3rd 2019 at the center of congress Pierre Baudis. As last year, the event will be right in the city center, in the Compans Cafarelli neighborhood. The center of congress Pierre Baudis is accessible by the subway, bus or even by car. This year we will have more space, more sponsors and more attendees

Steve is on the core team of Rust, leads the documentation team, and is an author of The Rust Programming Language. Klabnik is a frequent speaker at conferences and is a prolific open source contributor, previously working on projects such as Ruby and Ruby on Rails.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: 1. Purpose A primary goal of GDG Toulouse is to be inclusive to the largest number of contributors, with the most varied and diverse backgrounds possible. As such, we are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ability, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, and religion (or lack thereof). GDG Toulouse prides itself on being an open, respectful, and inclusive community. That means the jerky behavior isn‚Äôt allowed at GDG meetings.

item.title: FAQs
item.description: General What is DevFest Toulouse? The DevFest, or “Developers Festival”, is a technical conference for developers. It is aimed at students, professionals or simply curious technophiles. Throughout the day, renowned speakers will present a variety of topics: around mobile development, the web, data, connected objects, the cloud, DevOps, etc… as well as good development practices. Pauses are used to engage in dialogue and deepen the topics presented. Software development is a very broad subject and our selection committee is committed to providing a varied and interesting program.

item.title: OneStock

item.title: OpenAirlines
item.description: Partant du constat que chaque ann√©e pr√®s de 660 millions de tonnes de CO2 sont √©mises par les avions, soit plus de 20 000 kilos de CO2 par seconde, cette clean-tech a d√©cid√© d‚Äôagir en d√©veloppant des solutions innovantes pour aider les compagnies a√©riennes √† r√©duire leurs co√ªts et leur impact environnemental. Fruit de 7 ans de R&D, le logiciel d‚Äô√©co-pilotage SkyBreathe¬Æ Fuel Efficiency sort sur le march√© en 2013. S‚Äôappuyant sur des algorithmes de Big Data, d‚ÄôIntelligence Artificielle et de Machine Learning, le logiciel analyse automatiquement les tr√®s nombreuses donn√©es disponibles dans les boites noires des avions afin d‚Äô√©valuer l‚Äôefficacit√© √©nerg√©tique des vols et √©mettre des recommandations permettant de r√©duire la consommation de carburant et les √©missions de CO2 des avions.
